channel.title: Talbon isle :)
channel.description:
im developing a server on my own, as a.. well idk what for im jsut bored really. dont comment on this and say its spam because its [u]not[/u] as i am developing a server and this is rs2 server "development"/help, so its like right board :P anyways, im using choob isle as a base because its one of my favourite servers and easiest to work with.
[b][u]Features:[/b] Slayer tower (85% done) Moving shops around and changing them (done) Adding new mini games (yet to start) Add fully working silabsoft items (done) Add/change any skills i feel might need doing (50%) Add specs (ill try when i can get it to not error :l)
Thats about all i can think of doing right now, i shouldnt need much help but if i need anything ill post :D
(PICS COMING SOON)
50% creds to me 50% to mod adam for base.
